Package xml

Class Summary

Generates a possible DTD from an XML document instance.

SchemaMappingManager  
SchemaMappingManager.LoggingErrorHandler logs errors and warnings to Activity Log and rethrow exception on error and fatalError to prevent invalid documents to result in invalid SchemaMappings.

TagHighlight StructureMatcher finding the matching tag (open/close).
